alert.note: Alert for Eastern Chichagof Island; Glacier Bay; Juneau Borough and Northern Admiralty Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 02 at 1:08AM AKST until February 03 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and periods of light freezing rain expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches. Ice accumulations less than one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Juneau, Gustavus, Hoonah, Tenakee Springs. * WHEN...Until 9 PM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Wet snow may be difficult to manage. Light freezing rain will cover exposed surfaces with a coating of ice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Multiple rounds of wintry precipitation expected over the next few days. Accumulating snow has started with the heaviest snowfall rates expected through Wednesday morning. A lull in the heaviest precipitation is expected Wednesday afternoon through Thursday morning; however light snow may transition to periods of light freezing rain during this time. A second round of heavy snow and/or freezing rain is expected Thursday morning before a transition to rain late Thursday afternoon. Confidence is low regarding the exact timing of the transition to rain and the freezing rain potential Thursday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Chichagof Island; Glacier Bay; Juneau Borough and Northern Admiralty Island
